review.comment: Fantastic service and communication, fast turn around, very reasonably priced. They did all my signs for my building company and I was more than pleased with the quality of the product I received, also the advice, knowledge and superb design work! Cannot recommend sumo signs enough.
Great company with superfast delivery. Thanks guys

Great company and great service from Sumo. They listened to my needs and made the right recommendations at the price. Came away with stunning Exhibition Stands and several PVC Banners. I highly recommend this team. I'll be back for all my signage needs.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the review Mike. I'm glad we managed to hit your tight turnaround and help with the design. Look forward to hearing from you again for any of your future needs
